name: Satellite Sweethearts Demo
description:
A love as pure and infinite as that of Romeo and Juliet. Undefinable, but experienced across the ages.

Roman and Julie are teenagers living on one of Earth's orbiting space stations, but their love runs counter to the attitudes of others on the station. Will they be able to overcome the obstacles in their way, or will they give in to the wishes of those around them?

-

Satellite Sweethearts is a heartwarming visual novel love story by Milan Kazarka, Vysoko Anime Production.

This is a free demo. We'll be preparing the full release soon.

http://vysoko.com

http://satellitesweethearts.com
